item.title: Hey, need help! will be acredited for your help :)
item.dc:creator: @BACON555 BACON555
item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

okay! i have an error its one error… i need help with making it NOT an error -.- lol okay heres the code i created YES created didn’t leech -.- but wrote

} else if (ismember = 0) try { PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Desktop/webblifescape/data/members.txt", true)); bw.write((playername+)); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("error while writing in members.txt!"); e.printStackTrace(); } return 0; } } }
what i want the code to DO is kick a new player… or anyplayer so itll work with everyone when they log on and it kicks them then adds their name to the “members.txt” in the data folders and then when they log on they are member wooot lol (im too lazy to take down names lol) and now for the error…

client.java:35384: illegal start of expression bw.write((playername+)); /\ 1 error finished! press any key to continue . . .

and that /\ is pointing to the error lol its the first ) of bw.write((playername+)); that lol any help is greatly appreciated and credits will be givin

Read full topic
